<small>Aramaic form: **<big>[[H6606|פְּתַח]]</big>**</small>
 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּתַח‎</span> **verb** ==open== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פתח‎</span>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***pitû, patû***</u></abbr>; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פתח‎</span> [[BDB#Os|Os]]<sup>ZMG xix (1865), 197</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פְּתַח‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Nabataean, Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פתח‎</span>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[2Kgs.15.16|2Kgs 15:16]] +, etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִפְתַּח‎</span> [[Exod.21.33|Exod 21:33]] +; 3 masculine plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִפְתָּחוּם‎</span> [[Neh.13.19|Neh 13:19]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּתַחִ‎</span> [[2Kgs.13.17|2Kgs 13:17]] +; feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּתְחִיּ‎</span> [[Song.5.2|Song 5:2]] masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּתְחוּ‎</span> [[Josh.10.22|Josh 10:22]] +; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּתֹחַ‎</span> [[Deut.15.8|Deut 15:8]] +; construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְתֹח‎</span> [[Ezek.21.27|Ezek 21:27]] +; ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֹּתֵחַ‎</span> [[Judg.3.25|Judg 3:25]] +; ***pass***. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּתוּחַ‎</span> [[Jer.5.16|Jer 5:16]] +, etc.; — ***open*** sack, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׂק‎</span>, [[Gen.42.27|Gen 42:27]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַמְתַּחַת‎</span> [[Gen.43.21|Gen 43:21]]; [[Gen.44.11|Gen 44:11]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), skin-bottle (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נאוד‎</span>). [[Judg.4.19|Judg 4:19]], hamper (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֵּדָה‎</span>) [[Exod.2.6|Exod 2:6]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), pit (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בּוֺר‎</span>) [[Exod.21.33|Exod 21:33]] ([[BDB#E|E]]; i. e. uncover it), mouth (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּי‎</span>) of cave [[Josh.10.22|Josh 10:22]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), grave [[Ezek.37.12|Ezek 37:12]]; [[Ezek.37.13|Ezek 37:13]] (to bring forth dead), of. (in figurative) [[Jer.5.16|Jer 5:16]]; [[Ps.5.10|Ps 5:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּלִי פָתוּחַ‎</span> [[Num.19.15|Num 19:15]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) ***open vessel***; door (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֶּלֶת‎</span>; sometimes opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָגַר‎</span>) [[Judg.3.25|Judg 3:25]] + v[[Judg.3.25|Judg 3:25]] (object omitted), [[Judg.19.27|Judg 19:27]]; [[1Sam.3.15|1Sam 3:15]]; [[2Kgs.9.3|2Kgs 9:3]]; [[2Kgs.9.10|2Kgs 9:10]]; [[2Chr.29.3|2Chr 29:3]]; [[Job.31.32|Job 31:32]] (c.<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person); figurative of Leb. [[Zech.11.1|Zech 11:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דַּלתֵי שָׁמַיִם‎</span> [[Ps.78.23|Ps 78:23]] (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, sending rain); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ד‎</span> = city-gates [[Neh.13.19|Neh 13:19]]; [[Isa.45.1|Isa 45:1]](\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁעָרִים‎</span>; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לפְנֵי‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ד‎</span> omitted [[Song.5.2|Song 5:2]]; [[Song.5.5|Song 5:5]]; [[Song.5.6|Song 5:6]] gate (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁעַר‎</span>), of land [[Nah.3.13|Nah 3:13]] (Infinitive absolute + Imperfect **Niph\`al** q. v.), compare [[Ezek.25.9|Ezek 25:9]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁער‎</span> of temple (- court) [[Ezek.46.12|Ezek 46:12]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span>, person), [[Ps.118.19|Ps 118:19]] (***id.***), city [[Isa.26.2|Isa 26:2]], object omitted [[Deut.20.11|Deut 20:11]]; [[2Kgs.15.16|2Kgs 15:16]] window, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַלּוֺן‎</span>, [[2Kgs.13.17|2Kgs 13:17]] (twice in verse),<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲרֻבּוֺת הַשָׁמַיִם‎</span> (by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> sending rain) [[Gen.8.6|Gen 8:6]]([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Mal.3.10|Mal 3:10]] city [[Jer.13.19|Jer 13:19]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִיר פְּתוּחָה‎</span> [[Josh.8.17|Josh 8:17]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]); absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְלאֹ סגר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[Isa.22.22|Isa 22:22]] (twice in verse); — [[Isa.14.17|Isa 14:17]] is dubious, [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] [[BDB#Perles|Perles]]<sup>Anal. 28. 42</sup> [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] (in [[BDB#Di|Di]]) read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַאֲסִירָיו לאֹפֿ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּיתהַֿכֶּלֶא‎</span>; &gt; [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Marti|Marti]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲסִירָיו לאֹ פִּתַּח אִישׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְבֵיתוֺ‎</span>; storehouse, armoury [[Gen.41.56|Gen 41:56]]; [[Jer.50.25|Jer 50:25]] (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>), [[Jer.50.26|Jer 50:26]] (for destruction), figurative of sky, for rain [[Deut.28.12|Deut 28:12]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person; of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> ), compare ***open*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּ֑ר‎</span>, expose for sale, [[Amos.8.5|Amos 8:5]] ***open*** womb, i.e. grant offspring [[Gen.29.31|Gen 29:31]]; [[Gen.30.22|Gen 30:22]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); ***open*** mouth (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּה‎</span>) to cry, speak [[Ezek.21.27|Ezek 21:27]]; [[Job.3.1|Job 3:1]]; [[Dan.10.16|Dan 10:16]], hence = speak [[Isa.53.7|Isa 53:7]] (twice in verse); [[Job.33.2|Job 33:2]]; [[Ps.39.10|Ps 39:10]]; [[Ps.78.2|Ps 78:2]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּמָשָׁל‎</span>), [[Ps.109.2|Ps 109:2]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person), [[Prov.24.7|Prov 24:7]]; [[Prov.31.8|Prov 31:8]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person), v[[Prov.31.9|Prov 31:9]] v[[Prov.31.26|Prov 31:26]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּחָכְמָה‎</span>); [[Ps.49.5|Ps 49:5]] either ***utter, declare, propound*** riddle, or ***open up, expound***; have power of speech [[Ps.38.14|Ps 38:14]] of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> giving power of (prophetic) speech [[Ezek.3.27|Ezek 3:27]]; [[Ezek.33.22|Ezek 33:22]], giving speech to ass [[Num.22.28|Num 22:28]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); ***open*** mouth, to eat [[Ezek.3.2|Ezek 3:2]], of earth, to swallow up, [[Num.16.32|Num 16:32]]: [[Num.26.10|Num 26:10]], compare (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּה‎</span> omitted) [[Ps.106.17|Ps 106:17]] ***open*** lips, to speak [[Job.11.5|Job 11:5]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִם‎</span> person), [[Job.32.20|Job 32:20]] ([[BDB#Gi|Gi]] v[[Job.32.21|Job 32:21]]); of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> opening man's lips [[Ps.51.17|Ps 51:17]], man's ear [[Isa.50.5|Isa 50:5]] (Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***uznâ puttû***</u></abbr>); of eyes only passive participle, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> [[1Kgs.8.29|1Kgs 8:29]] = [[2Chr.6.20|2Chr 6:20]]; [[1Kgs.8.52|1Kgs 8:52]]; [[Neh.1.6|Neh 1:6]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> [[2Chr.6.40|2Chr 6:40]] (by zeugma), [[2Chr.7.15|2Chr 7:15]] (all of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s favour); ***open*** hand, in giving [[Deut.15.8|Deut 15:8]]; [[Deut.15.11|Deut 15:11]] (c, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person, + infinitive absolute), of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Ps.104.28|Ps 104:28]]; [[Ps.145.16|Ps 145:16]] book [[Neh.8.5|Neh 8:5]] (twice in verse), letter [[Neh.6.5|Neh 6:5]] ***open*** river (channel) [[Isa.41.18|Isa 41:18]] (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>), rock, letting out water, [[Ps.105.41|Ps 105:41]] (***id.***); ***open*** sword, = draw it [[Ezek.21.33|Ezek 21:33]]; [[Ps.37.14|Ps 37:14]] of root <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁרְשִׁי פָתוּחַ אֱלֵימָֿ֑יִם‎</span> [[Job.29.19|Job 29:19]], i.e. with no obstacle intervening. — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּפְתַּח אֶרֶץ‎</span> [[Isa.45.8|Isa 45:8]] is dubious; verb not elsewhere intransitive; [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Hpt</sup> [[BDB#Marti|Marti]] proposes <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַחְמָהּ‎</span> as object; [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] (in [[BDB#Di|Di]]) read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּפָּתַח‎</span>. **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִפְתַּח‎</span> [[Isa.5.27|Isa 5:27]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִפָּתַח‎</span> [[Ezek.24.27|Ezek 24:27]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִפָּתֵ֑חַ‎</span> [[Ezek.44.2|Ezek 44:2]] +, etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִפָּתֵחַ‎</span> [[Isa.51.14|Isa 51:14]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִפְתָּח‎</span> [[Zech.13.1|Zech 13:1]] — ***be opend***, of girdle [[Isa.5.27|Isa 5:27]] (i.e. loosened), compare of captive [[Isa.51.14|Isa 51:14]], and, of calamity, [[Jer.1.14|Jer 1:14]] ***be let loose*** (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person); gates [[Nah.2.7|Nah 2:7]]; [[Nah.3.13|Nah 3:13]] (of land, ***thrown open*** to (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span>) enemy), [[Ezek.44.2|Ezek 44:2]]; [[Ezek.46.1|Ezek 46:1]] (twice in verse); [[Neh.7.3|Neh 7:3]] impersonal of man shut in by God [[Job.12.14|Job 12:14]] of windows of heaven [[Gen.7.11|Gen 7:11]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), compare [[Isa.24.18|Isa 24:18]] (of future destruction); the heavens themselves [[Ezek.1.1|Ezek 1:1]](for visions); fountain [[Zech.13.1|Zech 13:1]] wine (-skin, with negative) [[Job.32.19|Job 32:19]] mouth, in speech [[Job.24.27|Job 24:27]]; [[Job.33.22|Job 33:22]] ears [[Isa.35.5|Isa 35:5]]. **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּתַּח‎</span> [[Job.30.11|Job 30:11]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּתֵּ֑חַ‎</span> [[Job.12.18|Job 12:18]] +, etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְפַתַּח‎</span>; [[Isa.28.24|Isa 28:24]], 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲפַתֵּחַ‎</span> [[Isa.45.1|Isa 45:1]], etc.; — ***Infinitive abs*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּתֵּחַ‎</span> [[Isa.58.6|Isa 58:6]] construct, ***id.*** [[Ps.102.21|Ps 102:21]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְפַתֵּ֑חַ‎</span> [[1Kgs.20.11|1Kgs 20:11]] — ***loose:*** 

**1.** ***free***, i.e. ungird, camels [[Gen.24.32|Gen 24:32]] ([[BDB#J|J]]): loins of kings [[Isa.45.1|Isa 45:1]] (i.e. disarm them); ***set free***, with suffix person [[Ps.105.20|Ps 105:20]]; [[Jer.40.4|Jer 40:4]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>); with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּנֵי תְמוּתָה‎</span> [[Ps.102.21|Ps 102:21]]. 

**2.** ***loosen*** (and remove) sack-cloth [[Isa.20.2|Isa 20:2]] (c.<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span> ), [[Ps.30.12|Ps 30:12]] armour [[1Kgs.20.11|1Kgs 20:11]] (object omitted; opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָגַר‎</span>); bonds [[Job.12.18|Job 12:18]]; [[Ps.116.16|Ps 116:16]], compare [[Isa.58.6|Isa 58:6]]; [[Job.39.5|Job 39:5]] cord [[Job.30.11|Job 30:11]]; [[Job.38.11|Job 38:11]] ***loosen*** ground [[Isa.28.24|Isa 28:24]] (in tillage; compare [[BDB#Vogelst|Vogelst]]<sup>Land wrirthschaft 38</sup>, Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***puttû***</u></abbr>).


**3.** open gates [[Isa.60.11|Isa 60:11]], doors [[Job.41.6|Job 41:6]] (figurative of crocodile's jaws); ear [[Isa.48.8|Isa 48:8]] (read probably either <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּתַּחְתִּי‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּתַחְתִּי‎</span> [[[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Marti|Marti]]], or <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִפְתְּחָה‎</span> [[[BDB#Gr|Gr]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] in [[BDB#Di|Di]]]; buds [[Song.7.13|Song 7:13]] (of blossom; object omitted; or intransitive, as sometimes Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> see [[BDB#Dozy|Dozy]]). **Hithpa\`el** ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎התפתחו‎</span> [[Isa.52.2|Isa 52:2]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] &lt; [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְפַּתְּחִי‎</span> (so [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]; of personified Jerusalem) ***loosen thee*** ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:54f»§ 54f</sup>) ***the fetters of thy neck***. 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּתַח‎</span>] **verb Pi\`el** ==engrave== (Late Hebrew Pi\`el ***id.***,<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּתּוּחַ‎</span> = Biblical Hebrew, and so [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]]; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***patâ—u***</u></abbr>, ***bore, penetrate***; compare perhaps Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***ring*** (compare [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>252</sup>)); — ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּתַּח‎</span> [[2Chr.3.7|2Chr 3:7]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְפַתַּח‎</span> [[1Kgs.7.36|1Kgs 7:36]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּפַתַּח‎</span> [[Exod.28.11|Exod 28:11]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְפַתֵּחַ‎</span> [[2Chr.2.6|2Chr 2:6]]; [[2Chr.2.13|2Chr 2:13]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְפַתֵּחַ‎</span> [[Zech.3.9|Zech 3:9]] — ***engrave***, with accusative + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span>, on metal [[1Kgs.7.36|1Kgs 7:36]]; [[2Chr.3.7|2Chr 3:7]]; [[Exod.28.36|Exod 28:36]] (accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּתּוּחֵי חוֺתָם‎</span>), on stone v[[Exod.28.9|Exod 28:9]] with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶבֶן‎</span> + accusative of congnate meaning with verb v[[Exod.28.11|Exod 28:11]](all [[BDB#P|P]]); with accusative of congnate meaning with verb only, [[Zech.3.9|Zech 3:9]] (on stone), and, in general, [[2Chr.2.6|2Chr 2:6]]; [[2Chr.2.13|2Chr 2:13]]. **Pu\`al** ***Participle*** feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְפֻתָּחֹת פִתּוּחֵי חוֺתָם‎</span> [[Exod.39.9|Exod 39:9]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) ***stones engraved with the engravings of signet***.
